#!/bin/bash

apt update -y && apt upgrade -y

# Install essential tools

#!/bin/bash
set -e

echo "üåê Installing Apache Web Server..."
echo "=================================="

# Install Apache
apt install -y apache2

# Enable modules
a2enmod rewrite
a2enmod ssl
a2enmod headers
a2enmod deflate

# Start and enable Apache
systemctl start apache2
systemctl enable apache2

# Configure Apache
echo "ServerName {{ $json.domain_name }}" >> /etc/apache2/apache2.conf

# Create virtual host
cat > /etc/apache2/sites-available/{{ $json.domain_name }}.conf << 'EOF'
<VirtualHost *:80>
    ServerName {{ $json.domain_name }}
    DocumentRoot /var/www/html
    ErrorLog ${APACHE_LOG_DIR}/error.log
    CustomLog ${APACHE_LOG_DIR}/access.log combined
    
    <Directory /var/www/html>
        Options Indexes FollowSymLinks
        AllowOverride All
        Require all granted
    </Directory>
</VirtualHost>
EOF

# Enable site and restart Apache
a2ensite {{ $json.domain_name }}.conf
systemctl reload apache2

echo "Apache version: $(apache2 -v | head -n 1)"
echo "‚úÖ Apache installed and configured!"

#!/bin/bash
set -e

echo "üê¨ Installing MySQL Database Server..."
echo "====================================="

# Pre-configure MySQL root password
echo "mysql-server mysql-server/root_password password {{ $json.mysql_root_password }}" | debconf-set-selections
echo "mysql-server mysql-server/root_password_again password {{ $json.mysql_root_password }}" | debconf-set-selections

# Install MySQL
apt install -y mysql-server mysql-client

# Start and enable MySQL
systemctl start mysql
systemctl enable mysql

# Secure MySQL installation
mysql -u root -p{{ $json.mysql_root_password }} -e "DELETE FROM mysql.user WHERE User='';"
mysql -u root -p{{ $json.mysql_root_password }} -e "DELETE FROM mysql.user WHERE User='root' AND Host NOT IN ('localhost', '127.0.0.1', '::1');"
mysql -u root -p{{ $json.mysql_root_password }} -e "DROP DATABASE IF EXISTS test;"
mysql -u root -p{{ $json.mysql_root_password }} -e "DELETE FROM mysql.db WHERE Db='test' OR Db='test\_%';"
mysql -u root -p{{ $json.mysql_root_password }} -e "FLUSH PRIVILEGES;"

# Create development database
mysql -u root -p{{ $json.mysql_root_password }} -e "CREATE DATABASE IF NOT EXISTS lamp_dev;"

# Install phpMyAdmin
export DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive
echo "phpmyadmin phpmyadmin/dbconfig-install boolean true" | debconf-set-selections
echo "phpmyadmin phpmyadmin/app-password-confirm password {{ $json.mysql_root_password }}" | debconf-set-selections
echo "phpmyadmin phpmyadmin/mysql/admin-pass password {{ $json.mysql_root_password }}" | debconf-set-selections
echo "phpmyadmin phpmyadmin/mysql/app-pass password {{ $json.mysql_root_password }}" | debconf-set-selections
echo "phpmyadmin phpmyadmin/reconfigure-webserver multiselect apache2" | debconf-set-selections

apt install -y phpmyadmin

# Configure phpMyAdmin
echo "Include /etc/phpmyadmin/apache.conf" >> /etc/apache2/apache2.conf
systemctl reload apache2

echo "MySQL version: $(mysql --version)"
echo "‚úÖ MySQL and phpMyAdmin installed!"

#!/bin/bash
set -e

echo "üêò Installing PHP and Extensions..."
echo "=================================="

# Add PHP repository
add-apt-repository -y ppa:ondrej/php
apt update

# Install PHP and common extensions
apt install -y php{{ $json.php_version }} php{{ $json.php_version }}-fpm php{{ $json.php_version }}-mysql php{{ $json.php_version }}-curl php{{ $json.php_version }}-gd php{{ $json.php_version }}-mbstring php{{ $json.php_version }}-xml php{{ $json.php_version }}-zip php{{ $json.php_version }}-intl php{{ $json.php_version }}-bcmath php{{ $json.php_version }}-json php{{ $json.php_version }}-imagick php{{ $json.php_version }}-dev

# Install Composer
curl -sS https://getcomposer.org/installer | php
mv composer.phar /usr/local/bin/composer
chmod +x /usr/local/bin/composer

# Configure PHP
php_ini=/etc/php/{{ $json.php_version }}/apache2/php.ini
sed -i 's/upload_max_filesize = 2M/upload_max_filesize = 100M/' $php_ini
sed -i 's/post_max_size = 8M/post_max_size = 100M/' $php_ini
sed -i 's/max_execution_time = 30/max_execution_time = 300/' $php_ini
sed -i 's/memory_limit = 128M/memory_limit = 512M/' $php_ini

# Enable PHP modules
a2enmod php{{ $json.php_version }}

# Restart Apache
systemctl restart apache2

echo "PHP version: $(php --version | head -n 1)"
echo "Composer version: $(composer --version)"
echo "‚úÖ PHP and extensions installed!"

#!/bin/bash
set -e

echo "üõ†Ô∏è Installing Development Tools..."
echo "=================================="

# Install Node.js and npm (for modern web development)
curl -fsSL https://deb.nodesource.com/setup_20.x | bash -
apt install -y nodejs

# Install development tools
apt install -y git vim nano htop tree

# Install VS Code Server (code-server)
curl -fsSL https://code-server.dev/install.sh | sh

# Install additional PHP tools
composer global require laravel/installer
composer global require symfony/cli

# Install WP-CLI for WordPress development
curl -O https://raw.githubusercontent.com/wp-cli/builds/gh-pages/phar/wp-cli.phar
chmod +x wp-cli.phar
mv wp-cli.phar /usr/local/bin/wp

echo "Node.js version: $(node --version)"
echo "npm version: $(npm --version)"
echo "‚úÖ Development tools installed!"

#!/bin/bash
set -e

echo "üë§ Creating Development User..."
echo "=============================="

# Create user
useradd -m -s /bin/bash {{ $json.username }}
echo "{{ $json.username }}:{{ $json.user_password }}" | chpasswd
usermod -aG sudo,www-data {{ $json.username }}

# Create project directories
su - {{ $json.username }} -c "mkdir -p ~/projects/{php,laravel,wordpress,html}"
su - {{ $json.username }} -c "mkdir -p ~/backups ~/scripts"

# Set up Git
su - {{ $json.username }} -c "git config --global user.name '{{ $json.username }}'"
su - {{ $json.username }} -c "git config --global user.email '{{ $json.username }}@example.com'"

# Generate SSH key
su - {{ $json.username }} -c "ssh-keygen -t rsa -b 4096 -C '{{ $json.username }}@lamp-dev' -N '' -f ~/.ssh/id_rsa"

# Set permissions for web directory
chown -R {{ $json.username }}:www-data /var/www/html
chmod -R 755 /var/www/html

echo "‚úÖ Development user created!"
